main.title: About Chunirec-International
intro.title: About Chunirec-International
intro.about: With the bookmarklet, you can look for a variety of play records on CHUNITHM, including your best record, recent play history, etc. Combining with the song constant data, you can even view details of your in-game rating.
intro.contact: More functionalities are expected, and we will keep updating the bookmarklet tool for your best experience. If you have any idea, or if you see something needed improvements, feel free to open an issue at GitHub, or DM the author MGMT.
usages.title: What can you do with Chunirec-International
usages.viewer.title: Score Viewer
usages.viewer.description: Just the score viewer. You can query your highscore record, recent play record, etc. With the song constant data, you can even get your rating and OVER POWER data. More information on how to use the score viewer, please refer to this page (WIP).
usages.exportCsv.title: Export as CSV
usages.exportCsv.description:
NOTE: To use this function, you need to execute chunirec-international in the song record page in CHUNITHM-NET.
Export your highscore record of all difficulty as a single CSV file. A CSV file, comma-separated values, can be opened by spreadsheet softwares such as Excel, where you can further analyze your own record. Note that the download file should be opened with UTF-8 encoding, or the file might not be correctly loaded.
howto.title: How to use CHUNITHM Bookmarklet
howto.step.bookmarkAdd: Add this page to your bookmarks, and rename it to chunirec international.
howto.step.bookmarkEdit: Open your bookmark list, found the added bookmark, then Edit the bookmark, clear the original link, paste the link you just copied, and finally click Save.
howto.step.gotoNet: Navigate to CHUNITHM-NET. If you haven't logged-in to CHUNITHM-NET before, you will have to first log-in to CHUNITHM-NET. How to log-in to CHUNITHM-NETï¼Ÿ (Chinese)
howto.step.run: After you successfully logged-in, open your bookmark list on the CHUNITHM-NET page, found the chunirec international bookmark you just added, then click it.
howto.step.done: Now there should be a button at the top of the page, as shown in the picture below. Click the button, it will do things for you.
howto.afterward: After you follow all the steps and successfully open the record viewer for the first time, you'll just have to repeat step 4 to step 6. If you face any problem when using the bookmarklet, just DM the author via Twitter or Discord.
